check_caster.description: Visually inspect the caster of the chair.

wipe_caster.description: Wipe the caster of the chair to keep it clean.

adjust_caster.description: Adjust the caster of the chair for smooth movement.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster of the chair.

clean_caster.description: Clean the caster to ensure smooth rotation.

check_wheel.description: Check the wheel of the chair for any irregularities.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the chair to remove dust.

adjust_wheel.description: Adjust the wheel of the chair for comfortable movement.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel of the chair.

check_seat.description: Check the seat of the chair for any deformities.

wipe_seat.description: Wipe the seat of the chair to maintain cleanliness.

adjust_seat.description: Adjust the seat of the chair for comfort.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat of the chair for hygienic purposes.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat of the chair for adjustment purposes.

verify_chair_leg_status.description: Verify the stability of the chair leg.

swipe_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to maintain its appearance.

inspect_chair_leg_status.description: Inspect the chair leg for stability.

inspect_chair_leg.description: Inspect the chair leg for any damage or issues.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to keep it dust-free.

check_all_parts.description: Check all parts of the chair including caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg for overall structure.

clean_all_parts.description: Clean all parts of the chair including caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

adjust_whole_chair.description: Adjust the entire chair including the caster, wheel, and seat for optimal comfort.

clean_wheel_and_caster.description: Clean the wheel and the caster for smooth movement.

clean_seat_and_leg.description: Clean the seat and the chair legs for hygienic purposes.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.
